body.p: Governor Bramlette D Sir= We trouble you with a little petition which we agreed to with our client to send to you The facts are certified by the Judge & County Atty. We suppose when a Sheriff arrests a man in accordance with his official duty. he has no right to put himself down as informer & claim 1/4th of the fine.
Whatever your Excellency may see fit to do will be entirely satisfactory to us

respectfully
your obt Sevts
Hunt & Beck aty
